atk_abil: Normal Attack: Attacks nearby enemies with a powerful stroke, and throws two auras of swords to attack far-away enemies. Restores HP slightly when attacking.
Skill Attack: Moves quickly (dash) towards enemy lines and attacks multiple enemies.
Special Ability 1: Raises the basic speed of game by 4%.
Special Ability 2: Increases movement speed and attack range of elf units by 3%
Special Ability 3: Moves quickly (dash) to the first attack target.
Special Ability 4: Immune to stun and paralysis.
Innervate: Reduces raid skill cool-time by 1%. (Innervate can be stacked, but cannot exceed 40%. Also applies when units are in Time Shop.)
atk_abil_sr: Normal Attack: Attacks nearby enemies with a powerful stroke, and throws two auras of swords to attack far-away enemies. Restores HP slightly when attacking.
Skill Attack: Moves quickly (dash) towards enemy lines and attacks multiple enemies.
Special Ability 1: Raises the basic speed of game by 8%.
Special Ability 2: Increases movement speed and attack range of elf units by 6%
Special Ability 3: Move quickly (dash) to the first attack target.
Special Ability 4: Immune to stun and paralysis.
Innervate: Reduces raid skill cool-time by 3%. (Innervate can be stacked, but cannot exceed 40%. Also applies when units are in Time Shop.)

buffs.description: Reduces raid skill cool-time even if Sword Dancer is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 3%, Max 40%).
buffs.name: Innervate
